note.p: Magistrate. Pupil at Shrewsbury School, 1821–8. Probably entertained at The Mount by CD’s sisters in 1825. Called to the Bar (Middle Temple), 1838. BA, Oxford (St John’s), 1847. J.P. for Somerset.
Correspondence vol. 1, letter from Catherine and Susan Darwin, 4 December [1825]
Dorset, England, Church of England deaths and burials, 1813–2010 PE/SDO (Ancestry.com, accessed 14 December 2022)
